name: Securonix
description: Search Securonix for User Violation and Activity (Event) information on Emails, Domains, and IPs

dataTypes.name: Username
dataTypes.description: Replace this regex with a regex for your own usernames

dataTypes.name: Hostname
dataTypes.description: Replace this regex with a regex for your own hostnames

options.name: URL
options.description: The base URL for the Securonix API including the schema (i.e., https://)

options.name: Password
options.description: Password for the provided Securonix username

options.name: Search Categories
options.description: Select one or more categories to search

options.name: Violation Days Back
options.description: The number of days you would like to look back for violations. Supports fractional days (e.g., 0.25 would be 8 hours). Defaults to 5 days.

options.name: Activity (Events) Days Back
options.description: The number of days you would like to look back for activity (events). Supports fractional days (e.g., 0.25 would be 8 hours).  It is not recommended to search back more than 7 days.

options.name: Activity (Events) Search Filter
options.description: A filter you would like to apply to the Activity search.  For example, it's recommended to filter by "resourcegroupname" in which case the Activity Search Filter value would be `resourcegroupname="my_resource_group"`.
